name: nativescript-urlhandler
description: Register custom URLs for your NativeScript app

scripts.clean: npm i rimraf && rimraf node_modules lib hooks platforms target '**/*.js' '**/*.js.map' 'app/**/*.js' 'app/**/*.js.map' && npm i
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Martin Reinhardt
